room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: My company chose the Escape Game for the first time as a team building activity for a large group of people - great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: I took a group of 14 employees 2 the escape room the staff here was very professional especially Crystal! Will definitely be doing business again! Recommended

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Stop thinking if you should go and just go! Had loads of fun! Definitely a good way to spend an hour, good team building. Staff super friendly and cool. Tbh more fun when you are paired with people you know. Definitely going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Super fun and great staff! Definitely coming back!!! Fun with friend and I would even say great for team building! I will be back! Oh and Chris the game host for us was fantastic!

room_title: Escape room "Team Building Opportunities" by The Escape Game Chicago in Chicago
review: Awesome team building experience! Great staff and fun time. Several theme and difficulty options available. Location very convenient from Michigan ave.
